pages.text: The $(9)Salvaging Table$() is used to break down affix items into their corresponding $(9)Rarity Materials$().
A strangely shaped piece of an unidentifiable metal.$(p)This material is obtained when salvaging common items.
An incredibly durable fabric, worn down by countless ages. It boasts not a single tear.$(p)Found when salvaging uncommon items.
A piece of the brightest crystal ever to exist. Though it is but a shard, it contains a strong magical power.$(p)Acquired from salvaging rare items.
Grains of sand from a magical realm, where arcane magic warps all life.$(p)Salvaging an epic item reduces them to this form.
A pearl of purified godlike energy. The immense power sealed within makes it quite volatile.$(p)These extraordinary creations may only be obtained through salvaging mythic items.
